statements: UPDATE game_event_logs SET game_outcome='Win' WHERE event_id=100;
UPDATE game_event_logs SET player_id=5, item_id=10, action='Pick up', timestamp='2021-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE event_id=150;
UPDATE game_event_logs SET action='attack', game_outcome='win' WHERE player_id=1 AND item_id=100
UPDATE game_event_logs SET game_outcome='lose', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, action='defend' WHERE event_id=5
UPDATE player_actions SET action_name = 'login' WHERE player_id = 123 AND action_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00'
UPDATE game_outcomes SET game_result = 'Win' , game_timestamp = '2022-01-02 08:30:00' WHERE outcome_id = 456
UPDATE player_actions SET action_name = 'login' WHERE player_id = 1 AND action_timestamp = '2022-08-25 10:30:00';
UPDATE game_outcomes SET game_result = 'win', game_timestamp = '2022-08-25 11:45:00' WHERE outcome_id = 100;
UPDATE players SET player_name='John Doe', player_level=10 WHERE player_id=1;
UPDATE game_logs SET log_time='2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE player_id=2;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 1001;
UPDATE game_logs SET log_description = 'Level up!' WHERE player_id = 1001 AND log_description IS NULL;
UPDATE game_events SET event_type = 'Level Up' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE player_actions SET action_details = 'Completed mission' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE game_events SET event_type='Win', event_details='Player won the game' WHERE event_id=101
UPDATE player_actions SET action_type='Logout', action_timestamp='2022-11-30 15:30:00', action_details='Player logged out of the game' WHERE player_id=201
UPDATE player_actions SET player_id = 123, action_type = 'move', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE action_id = 1;
UPDATE game_outcomes SET winner_id = 456, outcome_description = 'Game Over', timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE outcome_id = 2;
UPDATE player_actions SET action_description = 'New update description' WHERE action_id = 1;
UPDATE item_interactions SET interaction_type = 'New interaction type', timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
